answers.answer: hello, when i had my daughter i had a few problems befor we fell. i had a cyst on an ovary, i was on the pill, they took me off it and it slowely when. i put on a lot of weight to, i decided to try and lose 1/2 stone befor we fell but coz my mind was concentrated on that we fell straight away. if i were u i would put my mind to loosing weight and hopfully u will fall and try not to get stresses. best of luck x

You CAN get pregnant. I have PCOS and am overweight. I have met ALOT of women on here and inperson who are in the same boat as us. My doc put me on Birth Control but I dont want to be on birth control because I am trying to get pregnant. Then she put me on Metformin which is for people with type 2 diabetes. I am NOT diabetic but I believe have insulin restence. Working out will help to regulate your body. Eating heathly and staying positive always works. And if you RE believes that CLOMID will work, may docs rx clomid as the first ferility treatment. Best of luck to you. SSBD!

question: hello, sorry if i am posting in wrong forum and so sorry for my bad english also.. I am so overwieght and trying to lose weight..But now i want to get pregnant.. So is this possible that i can get pregnant by any chance??
